name: Pan-Fried Asparagus
briefdescription: Learn how to cook asparagus on the stove by pan-frying it in butter with olive oil and garlic for a flavorsome, family-pleasing vegetable side dish.
instructions: Melt butter in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Add olive oil, salt, and pepper; cook and stir until garlic is fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add asparagus and cook until fork-tender, turning asparagus often to ensure even cooking, about 10 minutes.

comments.comment: Sprinkle some parmesan cheese on it within the last two minutes and it will brown and crumble and add more flavor and a really good crunch with the taste
